channel.title: Server Problem - Items
channel.description:
When ever I try and wield a Godsword or D claws and this is what I get: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/v2zew1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/28i45du.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/pvue0.png[/img]
I think I know the problem, but I do not know the solution.
Problem: My client is different from my server, therefore it reads the wrong item. Say the godsword was ID 14053 on the server side, but it would originally be 13053 on the client side, so it's doing the armadyl helmet.
Solution: ???
Need some help!

item.title: Server Problem - Items
item.dc:creator: @pure_0wnz1 pure 0wnz1
item.description:
@pure_0wnz1 wrote:

is that nozscpae? try the official client
